::Prowl::

Prowl watches Iron Raptor walk into the shower, a bit concerned still. He 
walks over to a chair, sitting down in it and thinking of her.

He loved her. Prowl closes his eyes, relaxing and thinking of their first 
kiss. They were flying back from spying on the Newcomers, some Predacon 
faction that had crashed on the planet. Since Iron Raptor didn't have flight 
capability and since the two bases (the Ark and the Newcomer) were seperated 
by a body of water, Prowl had to carry her. For some strange reason, he had 
picked her up by the waist, and was extremely tempted to kiss her, so he did.

Prowl glanced at the bathroom door as the thought of her, wondering why there 
was more shuffling than was needed to a shower sounding from it. He jumps up, 
hearing a scream. That sounded like Iron Raptors!

He runs to the bathroom door, taking out his pellet gun just in case as he 
taps a button, the door opening..
